segments.text: What do you say to eating out , Maggie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , why not ? We haven't been out for dinner for quite a long time . A new French restaurant has just opened in our neighborhood . We can go there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do we need to book a table in advance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No need for that . It's not usually busy on weekdays .
segments.speaker: S2
